summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a late return from a trip. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes disclaimers regarding the information contained within.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a late return and emphasizing the confidentiality of the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, who is asked to call Epstein regarding the late return.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating in a personal context, indicating a relationship that may involve social or business interactions.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley on September 12, 2012.
The email discusses a late return from a trip.
The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and legal notices regarding the information shared.
